import React from'react';import siteContent from'../data/siteContent';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PhotosSection=_ref=>{let{handleButtonAction}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"photos",className:"min-h-screen py-20 bg-cover bg-center",style:{backgroundImage:`linear-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,0.8), rgba(0,0,0,0.8)), url(${siteContent.photos.background})`},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center mb-12",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl font-bold mb-4",children:siteContent.photos.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-300 max-w-2xl mx-auto",children:siteContent.photos.subtitle})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"columns-2 gap-6",children:siteContent.photos.gallery.map((photo,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-6 overflow-hidden rounded-lg group relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:photo.path,alt:photo.alt,className:"w-full h-auto object-cover transition-transform duration-500 group-hover:scale-110"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute inset-0 bg-black opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-60 transition-opacity duration-300"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute inset-0 flex items-end opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-300 p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-bold",children:photo.location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-300",children:photo.description})]})})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center mt-12",children:siteContent.photos.buttons.map((button,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleButtonAction(button),className:getButtonClass(button.type),children:button.text},index))})]})});};// Helper function for button styling
const getButtonClass=type=>{switch(type){case'primary':return"px-6 py-3 bg-yellow-500 text-gray-900 font-bold rounded-full";case'secondary':return"px-6 py-3 border-2 border-white text-white rounded-full";case'outlined':return"px-6 py-3 border-2 border-yellow-500 text-yellow-500 font-bold rounded-full";default:return"px-6 py-3 bg-gray-800 text-white rounded-full";}};export default PhotosSection;
